definitions.text: prove capable or fit; meet requirements

examples: She was qualified to run the marathon
They nurses were qualified to administer the injections
Your education qualifies you for this job

definitions.text: specify as a condition or requirement in a contract or agreement; make an express demand or provision in an agreement
examples: The will stipulates that she can live in the house for the rest of her life
The contract stipulates the dates of the payments

definitions.text: describe or portray the character or the qualities or peculiarities of
examples: You can characterize his behavior as that of an egotist
This poem can be characterized as a lament for a dead lover

definitions.text: add a modifier to a constituent
